ing.item: Tomatoes sliced in 1/2 inch thick slices

directions.step:
Using a 4-inch cookie sheet, layer tomatoes, celery, onions, blue cheese and Parmesan cheese in this order. Sprinkle Italian dressing over top. Cover with plastic wrap; refrigerate several hours. If you serve directly from cookie sheet, cover the bottom with foil. These stay good for several days.
NOTES : These are my quick Church or club stand by.
